sentences.en: And it's assumed that the dust fertilizes the rainforest.
sentences.cn: 我们设想,正是这些尘土滋润着雨林.

sentences.en: I will see some beautiful birds if I walk through a rainforest.
sentences.cn: 如果我穿过热带雨林,我将看到一些漂亮的鸟.

sentences.en: It is always hot a rainforest and the ground is always wet.
sentences.cn: 雨林里总是很热.而且地面总是潮湿的.

sentences.en: Leg wrappings are necessary when venturing into tropical rainforest.
sentences.cn: 去热带雨林里探险,必须扎上绑带.

sentences.en: Madagascar's ecosystems range from rainforest to semi-desert.
sentences.cn: 马达加斯加生态系统类型多样，从雨林到半荒漠等不一而足。

sentences.en: Mr Mendes was leading a campaign to save Brazil's rainforest from exploitation.
sentences.cn: 门德斯先生正领导一场运动，以拯救遭到乱砍滥伐的巴西热带雨林。

sentences.en: New taxa rainforest taxonomy Sinopimoa gen . nov. Sinopimoa bicolor sp . nov.
sentences.cn: 新阶元雨林分类华模蛛属双色华模蛛.

sentences.en: Perhaps you are standing stone in the river, suffered sun rainforest.
sentences.cn: 也许你是小河中矗立的顽石, 受尽日晒雨林.

sentences.en: The biggest rainforest is in South America, it's called the Amazon.
sentences.cn: 最大的雨林在南美洲, 被称为亚马孙雨林.

sentences.en: The rainforest around our house sometimes brings forth intriguing creatures like this.
sentences.cn: 我们的房子周围的雨林有时带来了这样有趣的生物。

sentences.en: The rainforest is being systematically destroyed.
The rainforest is essential in other areas also.
sentences.cn: 雨林在其他地区也是必不可少的。

sentences.en: The Rainforest name has become synonymous with excellence in quality and innovative technology climate control.
sentences.cn: Rainforest已成为品质技术创新和引领潮流的的代名词.

sentences.en: The yield difference between ravine rainforest and secondary forest was not significant.
sentences.cn: 沟谷雨林和次生林下阳春砂仁果实产量差异不显著.

sentences.en: Then we carried on in the worst conditions yet: low, tangled rainforest that blocked out the light, and mud up to our thighs.
sentences.cn: 那时我们还在最糟糕的环境里行进着：低矮、纷乱的雨林遮住了阳光，泥浆没至我们的大腿。

sentences.en: There wouldn't be much room left for the rainforest.
sentences.cn: 这样就会侵害到雨林的生存空间.

sentences.en: They are all from a rainforest in South America.
sentences.cn: 这些生物全部来自南美洲一处雨林处.

sentences.en: tribes living in remote areas of the Amazonian rainforest
sentences.cn: 居住在亚马孙河雨林偏远地区的部落
